description:
A minimal Server Side Action (Decode URI) that takes a text (string) as its input and spits out a URL-decoded version at its output.

BONUS BEATS: Another minimal Server Side Action (Encode URI) that takes a text (string) as its input and spits out a URL-ENCODED version at its output. It's like the exact opposite of the other one! Because you'll probably need that.

Whoa!

Using this? Donate here or you might die in a disco inferno (jussayin'):

Click here: https://grupz.com/karma

A song about these plugins:

"Decode URLs,
decode URIs!
Do it in the backend, baby,
give it to me SERVER SIDE!!

URL encoder,
like Giorgio Moroder.
If you got the seed,
I'll give you what you need."
name: Decode URL/URI SSA (Server Side)
plugin_instructions:
Put this action in a workflow. Send it your string you need URL-decoded (via the "Text to URL Decode" field).

The decoded string appears at the action's "Decoded Text" output.

Easy-peasey.

(For the Encoder plugin, do the same, basically. Send string to encode. URL-encoded string appears at the action's "Encoded Text" output.)
